mapper.insert: insert into t_script_info ( scriptid, scriptname, scriptpath, createtime, createuser, updatetime, updateuser) values (#{scriptid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scriptname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scriptpath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from t_script_info order by updatetime desc
select * from t_script_info order by updatetime desc limit #{page},#{rows}
select count(1) from t_script_info order by updatetime desc limit #{page},#{rows}
